operations.summary: Returns a list of all Gauge Data Source objects

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: SCIM filter

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies a property value by which to sort

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Specifies either ascending or descending alphabetical order

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of the first result to return

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Indicates the number of results per page

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

responseMessages.message: The requested operation succeeded
The requested operation succeeded and no further information has been provided, such as in the case of a DELETE operation.
The request contents are incorrectly formatted or the request was made for an invalid API version.
The requester cannot be authenticated
The requester does not have the required privileges or another constraint failed, such as attempting to delete an edit-only object.
The requested path does not refer to an existing object or object relation.

The requested operation could not be performed due to the current state of the configuration. For example, an attempt was made to create an object that already exists or an attempt was made to delete an object that is referred to by another object.
The request is such that the Accept header does not indicate that JSON is an acceptable format for a response.
The server encountered an unexpected error.

operations.summary: Add a new Gauge Data Source to the config

parameters.description: Gauge Data Source to add
parameters.name: add-gauge-data-source-request
attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

parameters.name: applyChangeTo
parameters.description: Specify whether to apply this configuration change to a single server or the whole server group. This does not apply to mirrored subtree objects

add-gauge-data-source-request.description: A Gauge Data Source resource request

sourceName.description: Name of the new Gauge Data Source

resourceAttribute.description: Specifies the attribute whose value is used to identify the specific resource being monitored (e.g. device name).

divideValueBy.description: An optional floating point value that can be used to scale the resulting value.

divideValueByAttribute.description: An optional property that can scale the resulting value by another attribute in the monitored entry.

additionalText.description: Additional information about the source of this data that is added to alerts sent as a result of gauges that use this Gauge Data Source.

monitorObjectclass.description: The object class name of the monitor entries to examine for generating gauge data.

minimumUpdateInterval.description: The minimum frequency with which gauges using this Gauge Data Source can be configured for update. In order to prevent undesirable side effects, some Gauge Data Sources may use this property to impose a higher bound on the update frequency of gauges.

description.description: A description for this Gauge Data Source

dataOrientation.description: Indicates whether a higher or lower value is a more severe condition.

divideValueByCounterAttribute.description: An optional property that can scale the resulting value by another attribute whose value represents a counter in the monitored entry.

statisticType.description: Specifies the type of statistic to include in the output for the monitored attribute.

monitorAttribute.description: Specifies the attribute on the monitor entries from which to derive the current gauge value.

includeFilter.description: An optional LDAP filter that can be used restrict which monitor entries are used to compute output.

resourceType.description: A string indicating the type of resource being monitored.
